content: Is it possible for someone @Eric Wieser @Johan Commelin to take another look at this? It would be a major usability improvement for interactions with the linear independence API.
Let's resume discussion in the other thread, https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/287929-mathlib4/topic/Spelling.20of.20Subtype.2Eval.20in.20LinearIndependent/near/399676188
